document_data.name: Dart of Silencing
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dart of silencing''''' was a type of [[dart]] used by the [[drow]].
document_data.Powers: If this dart missed a living target, it did nothing and could be reused. However, if it successfully struck a target, it enveloped the victim and a continuous area of a {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} radius around them in temporary magical silence. This silence persisted even if the dart was removed and discarded. The effect could be ended prematurely with ''[[dispel magic]]''.
